SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: NATIONAL SCHOOL CHOICE WEEK (NSCW) IS A NON-PARTISAN, NON-POLITICAL EFFORT TO RAISE BROAD PUBLIC AWARENESS OF THE PUBLIC, CHARTER, MAGNET, PRIVATE, ONLINE, AND HOME EDUCATION OPTIONS AVAILABLE FOR CHILDREN AND FAMILIES ACROSS THE U.S. IN 2020-21, NSCW PARTNERED TO PROVIDE FREE EDUCATIONAL RESOURCES TO 21,647 SCHOOLS, HOMESCHOOL GROUPS, AND ORGANIZATIONS AND PLAN 57 LARGE WEB-BASED SCHOOL FAIRS, INFORMATION SESSIONS, AND OTHER EVENTS. NSCW DEVELOPS AND MAINTAINS THE NATION'S MOST EXTENSIVE PORTFOLIO OF FREE SCHOOL SEARCH RESOURCES FOR PARENTS, CREATING 75 ARTICLES AND RESOURCE ROUNDUPS IN 2020-21, ULTIMATELY SERVING 1.37 MILLION FAMILIES.

ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: COMPLETED APPLICATION AND A LETTER INCLUDING DESCRIPTION AND NEEDS OF THE ORGANIZATION.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: MOST NEW GRANTS AWARDED RELATE TO IMPROVING K-12 EDUCATION.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NATIONAL RIGHT TO WORK LEGAL DEFENSE
HOPE HALL (DIRECTED GRANT FROM MARCIA SMITH)

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE GRANT IS TO PROVIDE FUNDS FOR THE LOS NINOS DEL CAPITAN A.C. RENOVATIONS, REPAIRS AND EXPANSION OF THEIR CURRENT FACILITY WHICH ENABLES THEM TO PROVIDE AFTER SCHOOL CARE TO MANY CHILDREN WHO OTHERWISE WOULD BE CONSIDERED "LATCH KEY" CHILDREN.
ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.ResultsOfVerificationTxt: THE GRANTEE IS PERFORMING A TREMENDOUS SERVICE TO THE WORKING POOR BY PROVIDING DAY CARE AND EDUCATIONAL SERVICES.

GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: FORM 990-PF HAS BEEN AMENDED TO CORRECT MATHEMATICAL ERROR ON PART I, LINE 4, COLUMN B. THE ORGANIZATION HAS MOVED SINCE THE ORIGINAL FILING. THE ADDRESS HAS BEEN UPDATED TO REFLECT CURRENT ADDRESS ON PART VII-A, LINE 14; PART VIII, LINES 1 AND 2; AND PART XV, LINE 2A.
